pages.text: $(#630000)The Masticator is a special tool that functions as a sort of mix between a Flamethrower and a Beckon. The miasma it spews infests blocks it comes into contact with, granting Evolution Points.
$(#630000)It can be created by giving Moldered Segments to a Stage I Beckon.

$(#630000)The Masticator cannot function without fuel, however, in the form of Fetid 'Canisters'. These flesh mounds are crafted from various high-ranking parasite tissues, as well as Beckon Membranes.

$(#630000)It can also be upgraded with a Stage IV Beckon into a much stronger variant upon the emergence of a Node. The Consecrator is capable of spreading the Parasite Biome and its related tissues, furthering parasite evolution more drastically than its predecessor.
$(#630000)The Consecrator can only be created in the Parasite Biome, via giving either an existing Masticator or Moldered Segments to a Stage IV Beckon.
